entry.title: NeuromatchAcademy/precourse
entry.summary:
A repo for the pre-course work at home exercises

Prerequisites and preparatory materials

Head to https://compneuro.neuromatch.io/prereqs/ComputationalNeuroscience.html if you are taking the Computational Neuroscience course!

Head to https://deeplearning.neuromatch.io/prereqs/DeepLearning.html if you are taking the Deep Learning course!

Licensing

The contents of this repository are shared under under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

Software elements are additionally licensed under the BSD (3-Clause) License.

Derivative works may use the license that is more appropriate to the relevant context.
